tool_description: Manages domain renewals, tracks expiration dates, and handles bulk renewal operations with notification scheduling.

domain_names.description: List of domains to manage renewals for

notification_days.description: Days before expiration to send notifications (e.g., [90, 30, 7])

bulk_discount.description: Apply bulk renewal discounts if available

error_messages: Invalid domain list: One or more domains are not valid or not owned by account.
Renewal period invalid: Renewal years must be between 1 and 10.
Payment method required: No valid payment method found for renewal processing.
Domain transfer lock: Some domains are locked and cannot be renewed until lock is removed.
Registrar maintenance: Domain registrar is under maintenance, try again later.
usage: Provide list of domains and renewal period. Configure auto-renewal settings and notification schedule. The tool processes renewals and sets up monitoring.

failed_renewals.description: List of domains that failed to renew

total_cost.description: Total cost of all renewals in USD

next_expiration.description: Date of next domain expiration in ISO format
